page.title: 10Employment
page.content: {Beam Bridge Hotel The Beam Bridge Hotel has a 2-star rating with the AA. It employs 6 fulltime people and 4 part-timers. It is good for snacks and drinks as well as being a hotel. Its hours are 11 to 2.30 and 6 till 11 p.m. {Gravel Pit} The Gravel Pit is at the top of Whiteball Hill. It employs 2 people. {Greenham Saddlery Greenham Saddlery caters in anything to do with horses but mainly horse rugs. It started in l979 and sold over 1000 rugs last winter. It employs 8 people in winter but it varies in summer. They make 12 different rugs in ten different sizes.
